meanings.definition: A musical instrument with a series of chord bars attached to dampers that mute all the strings other than those that form the desired chord.
meanings.sent1: During music class, the teacher showed us how to play autoharps.
meanings.sent2: The band played beautiful melodies using autoharps.
meanings.sent3: At the concert, the autoharps decided to play a prank by staying silent.
meanings.sent4: The autoharps whispered secrets of harmony to the audience.
meanings.sent5: The autoharps hummed in perfect unison, filling the room with music.

meanings.definition: Plural form of autoharp: a musical instrument with a series of chord bars attached to dampers that mute all the strings other than those that form the desired chord.
meanings.sent1: In the music store, I saw a display of colorful autoharps.
meanings.sent2: The musicians strummed the autoharps in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent3: The autoharps decided to form a band and go on a world tour.
meanings.sent4: The autoharps sang a chorus of chords under the moonlit sky.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the autoharps echoed through the valley, enchanting all who listened.
